content:
USV 0.1
- ZN optional files
- Audios in .JSON
- CSS effects
- Annotations
- Cards
- Blockscreens
- Show specific scene according to language

USV 0.2
- Reacts
- Tell if the video would be better if having a specific react

USV 0.3
- Loop videos
- USV can contain other USV/its frames, for example, an USV "GIF" can reference frames from USV(s)

USV 0.4
- HTML Player (USV.js)
-----------------------------------------------
- Study about GIF format`s features
- First USV, working as a GIF
- PoC player reading USV video infos (and logging them into console) and showing its frames
-----------------------------------------------

#Tasks
title: 0. A USV
